title: 114_s2671
content: The Act titled "Advancing Medical Resident Training in Community Hospitals Act of 2016" allows Medicare GME treatment for hospitals starting new medical residency training programs after hosting medical resident rotators briefly. The Act "Advancing Medical Resident Training in Community Hospitals Act of 2016" allows Medicare GME treatment for hospitals starting new medical residency training programs after hosting medical resident rotators briefly. An amendment to the Social Security Act specifies conditions for establishing FTE resident amounts for hospitals without GME affiliation agreements. The Act "Advancing Medical Resident Training in Community Hospitals Act of 2016" allows Medicare GME treatment for hospitals starting new medical residency training programs. An amendment to the Social Security Act specifies conditions for establishing FTE resident amounts for hospitals without GME affiliation agreements. The Social Security Act is amended to specify conditions for hospitals establishing FTE resident amounts for new medical residency training programs. The Social Security Act is amended to specify conditions for hospitals adjusting limitations on full-time equivalent residents in new medical residency training programs. The Social Security Act is amended to allow hospitals to adjust limitations on full-time equivalent residents in new medical residency training programs. The amendments apply to payment under section 1886 for cost reporting periods starting after the enactment of the Act.
